pr_title: NMS-12980: handle all ifOperStatus values in SNMP interface poller

timeline.message: refactor interface statuses to an enum
WIP but this laptop keeps blue screening

i think perhaps if you are not using criteria then interface elements do
nothing so somehow this has to get configured somewhere else
let's document the SNMP interface poller!
refactor so effective up/down values get returned when requested
Merge branch 'feature/enhanceSnmpIfacePoller' of github.com:dschlenk/opennms into feature/enhanceSnmpIfacePoller
events for down-ish states of ifOperStatus; update docs
explicit default values for attributes with default values
Merge branch 'feature/enhanceSnmpIfacePoller' of github.com:dschlenk/opennms into feature/enhanceSnmpIfacePoller
reduce interface down alarms from polling & traps
forgot to remove interface from reduction key to make it possible to reduce SNMP_Link_Down and interfaceOperDown alarms
if now in a down state, send down event(s) when prior value was not down instead of explicitly only an up value
simplify and correct behavior for sending up after any non-up state

timeline.author: christianpape

timeline.bodyText: Please use .* imports only for static imports.
timeline.author: christianpape

timeline.bodyText: Please use { ... } for blocks, even for one-line blocks.
timeline.author: christianpape
